response:
<<<api>>>: Iterator.next
<<<code>>>: You can use an iterator to achieve this. You can create an iterator for the dataSnapshot.getChildren() and then use the hasNext() and next() methods to retrieve the values.
<<<explanation>>>: You can use the following code to achieve this:
```
Iterator<DataSnapshot> iterator = dataSnapshot.getChildren().iterator();
while (iterator.hasNext()) {
    DataSnapshot dataSnapshot1 = iterator.next();
    names.add(dataSnapshot1.getValue(String.class));
}
```
This will iterate through all the children of the dataSnapshot and add the value of each child to the names list.
